attributes.action: Raise awareness and help stopping hate crime towards Asian communities
attributes.additional_details: I wish to gain help from the government due to fast rise of attacks and hatred showing towards our Asian communities and it has already caused many fatal injuries physically and mentally and it is a must do, must react and must taught subject and issue!
attributes.background: I hope our government and leaders could help raise more awareness in Asian targeted hate crime and attacks on people! This has been an ongoing situation and not enough has been done nor talked about! I believe we can make a huge impact to society if people were taught and spoken about it

rejection.details:
We are sorry to hear about the experiences you have been through. We understand that you would like the Government to help stop racism against Asians but it is not clear what specific action you would like the Government to take.

Discrimination and abuse on the grounds of race is already illegal and if you would like to know more about how to report any such abuse and discrimination you can find out more by clicking this link below: https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/law-and-courts/discrimination/hate-crime/

If you have been victim to or witnessed a crime you should report this to the police: https://www.police.uk/pu/contact-the-police/report-a-crime-incident/
